list_definition.definition: in weaving, a piece of equipment for carrying the thread backwards and forwards across the other threads.
a piece of machinery for making loops in the lower thread in a sewing-machine.

list_definition.mean_english: hệ thống giao thông vận tải tuyến đường ngắn
list_definition.definition: an air, train or other transport service etc which operates constantly backwards and forwards between two places

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: an airline shuttle between London and Edinburgh
space shuttle (= a craft travelling between space stations).
